docs.title: Home
docs.text: # Recos Technical Documentation  _Your AI-powered assistant for smarter, faster, and fairer recruitment._   Recos is an intelligent recruitment platform that integrates seamlessly with Odoo and Google Calendar—powered by advanced AI for interviews, reporting, and hiring analytics.

docs.title: Why Choose Recos?
docs.text:
• Next-Gen AI: Automated candidate assessment, interview question generation, and detailed analytics.
  • Odoo Integration: Instantly connect, sync jobs/candidates, and manage all recruitment data in one place.
  • Google Calendar/Meet: Effortless interview scheduling with automatic Meet link generation.
  • Real-Time Transcription: AssemblyAI integration for live interview transcription and Gemini analytics.
  • Modern Stack: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Django REST. Deployed with Vercel CI/CD.
  • API-First: All features are accessible via tested REST APIs (see API Reference).

docs.title: Platform at a Glance
docs.text: For more about the Recos vision, see our Informational Website. Ready to get started? Jump to the next section!

docs.title: Main Endpoints
docs.text: Below are the core API endpoints available in Recos. All endpoints follow REST conventions and require authentication.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
POST   /register/           # Recruiter registration
POST   /login/              # Login
POST   /logout/             # Logout

docs.title: Password Management
docs.text:
POST   /forgot-password/          # Start password reset
POST   /reset-password/           # Complete password reset
POST   /verify-reset-code/        # Verify reset code sent to email

docs.title: Recruiter & Profile
docs.text:
GET    /users/                    # List all recruiters
PUT    /update-profile/           # Update your profile
DELETE /delete-account/           # Delete your account

docs.title: Odoo Integration
docs.text:
POST   /verify-odoo/              # Verify Odoo account
POST   /odoo-credentials/         # Add Odoo credentials
GET    /odoo-credentials/list/    # List Odoo credentials
GET    /companies/                # List companies
GET    /companies/<company_id>/jobs/    # Get jobs by company

docs.title: Jobs & Candidates
docs.text:
GET    /jobs/                     # List all jobs
GET    /jobs/<job_id>/candidates/ # Get candidates for a specific job
GET    /candidates/               # List all candidates
GET    /candidates/<candidate_id>/attachments/   # Candidate attachments
GET    /candidates/<candidate_id>/attachments/download/<attachment_id>/   # Download attachment

docs.title: Sync Operations (Odoo Data)
docs.text:
POST   /sync/jobs/company/<company_id>/          # Sync jobs for a company
POST   /sync/jobs/handle-duplicates/             # Sync jobs & handle duplicates
POST   /sync/jobs/user/                          # Sync jobs for logged-in user
POST   /sync/candidates/job/<job_id>/            # Sync candidates for a job
POST   /sync/candidates/company/<company_id>/    # Sync candidates by company
POST   /sync/candidates/all/                     # Sync all candidates
POST   /sync/candidates/<candidate_id>/attachments/   # Sync candidate attachments

docs.title: Interview Management
docs.text:
POST   /interviews/create/                                   # Create interview
POST   /interviews/<interview_id>/create-calendar-event/     # Add interview to Google Calendar
GET    /interviews/<interview_id>/analytics/                 # Get interview analytics (AI/Gemini)

docs.title: AI Reports & Conversations
docs.text:
GET    /interview_conversations/     # List all interview conversations
GET    /ai-reports/                  # List all AI reports

docs.title: Google Calendar & OAuth
docs.text:
GET    /auth/google/initiate/    # Start Google OAuth
GET    /auth/google/callback/    # Google OAuth callback
GET    /api/auth/google/callback/# API-level OAuth callback

docs.title: Odoo Integration
docs.text:

POST /verify-odoo/
{
  "instance_url": "https://your-odoo.com",
  "email": "you@example.com",
  "api_key": "..."
}
  • Fetch Jobs from Odoo:
GET /odoo/jobs

GET /odoo/candidates

docs.title: Google Calendar / Meet Integration
docs.text:
• Schedule Interview Event:
POST /interviews/{interview_id}/create-calendar-event/

POST /calendar/events
  • Get All Google Meet Links:
GET /calendar/meets

docs.title: AI, AssemblyAI, and Gemini
docs.text:
• Start Interview with AI Assistant (transcription):
POST /interviews/create/
  • Get Post-Interview Analytics:
GET /interviews/{interview_id}/analytics/

docs.title: Attachments
docs.text:
• Get Candidate Attachments:
GET /candidates/{candidate_id}/attachments/
  • Download Attachment:
GET /candidates/{candidate_id}/attachments/download/{attachment_id}/

docs.title: Frontend (Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind)
docs.text:
• Components: Always use functional components.
  • Naming: camelCase for variables, PascalCase for components, SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE for constants.
  • Files: One component per file. Group by feature.
  • Testing: Use Jest + React Testing Library for unit tests.
  • Styling: Tailwind for all styling.

docs.title: Backend (Django, DRF)
docs.text:
• Naming: snake_case for variables and functions, PascalCase for classes.
  • Serializers/Views: One per file unless very related.
  • Testing: Use Django's built-in test runner.

docs.title: General
docs.text:
• Linting: Prettier + ESLint (frontend), flake8 (backend).
  • PRs: Clear summaries, link related issues, request review.

docs.title: Frontend
docs.text:
• Deployed to Vercel, auto-deployment from main branch.
  • Environment variables managed via .env.

docs.title: Backend
docs.text:
• Django REST deployed using [your deployment method, e.g., Heroku, AWS, etc.]
  • Static/media files managed via cloud storage if needed.

docs.title: CI/CD
docs.text:
• GitHub Actions for all codebases.
  • Pre-deploy: test, build, and lint checks.

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.text:
• Frontend: Next.js + Tailwind + TypeScript (Vercel)
  • Backend: Python, Django REST Framework
  • Integrations: Odoo, Google Calendar, AssemblyAI, Gemini
  • CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Vercel

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Sign Up: Fill in your first name, last name, email, and password.

  2. Login

  3. Password Reset: Use the "Forgot Password?" link. A reset code will be sent to your email.

docs.title: Connecting to Odoo
docs.text:
• Input your Odoo instance URL, email, and API key.
  • Example: Odoo Instance URL: https://your-odoo-instance.com Email: your@email.com API Key: xxxxxxxx

docs.title: Company Selection & Dashboard
docs.text:
• After connection, select your company from the list.
  • Explore the dashboard for open jobs, candidates, and interviews.

docs.title: Odoo
docs.text:
• Connect using your instance URL, email, API key.
  • Sample API Calls:
  • GET /odoo/jobs
  • GET /odoo/candidates

docs.title: Google Calendar/Meet
docs.text:
• Schedule interviews, generate Google Meet links.
  • Sample API Calls:
  • POST /calendar/events
  • GET /calendar/meets
